# TaalTools - Drum Multichannel Track Splitter
Professional drum track processor that automatically splits a 32-channel recording into 15 properly named and routed stereo tracks. Ideal for studio drum recordings with standardized input configurations.
## Features - Automatically creates 15 stereo tracks - Sets up proper channel routing - Names and colors tracks according to common drum standards - Supports channels 3-32 for standard recording setups

# TaalTools - Bus Creator
Creates a bus track and automatically routes selected tracks to it.
## Features - Creates a new bus track - Routes selected tracks' channels 1/2 to the bus - Disables master/parent send on selected tracks

# TaalTools - Volume Up
Increases the volume of selected tracks by 0.5dB.
## Features - Subtle volume increase (0.5dB) - Works on multiple selected tracks - Includes undo support

# TaalTools - Volume Down
Decreases the volume of selected tracks by 0.5dB.
## Features - Subtle volume decrease (0.5dB) - Works on multiple selected tracks - Includes undo support
